reviews.review: This is the only platforming slash puzzle game I like, and I love the crap out of it. 5 stars.
One of the best games I played in my life. The atmosphere, the characters, and the gameplay are just excellent! I regret not buying the pack with the first game :,D
if you havent already heard of it, WHAT THE FUCK
This is one of my favourite games ever. Great writing, fantastic voice acting, super fun and challenging gameplay, co-op mode is excellent. Portal isn't about 'why'.... it's about WHY NOT??!
En yakın arkadaşınla veya biricik sevgilinle kafa yorarak beyin yakarak eğlenmek istiyorsanız tam size göre

Ce jeu est considéré comme un pilier du gaming et qu'on se le dise, il mérite largement cette renommée. C'est le meilleur jeu et je pèse mes mots au niveau réflexion, plateforme. Ce jeu peut vous donner du fil à retordre. De plus, l'histoire est très étonnante, je ne pensais pas que l'histoire aurait pu être intéressante mais bon faut croire que je me suis trompé sur toute la ligne. On à devant nous quelque chose de très bien géré, un jeu qui frôle la perfection ou peut-être parvient à l'atteindre. De plus, pour en profiter toujours plus, il y a le mode coop. A faire à tout prix si vous avez le jeu. C'est assez drôle de devoir réfléchir à deux. Le mode coop propose de nouveaux défis, une nouvelle histoire. Que demander de plus ?
musg mnie bolj od myslenia mocno
The koop-mode is really fun and well made.
кто хочет вместе поиграть?добовляйте в др в стиме и дсе ch3nt0#6909
Is good, not as good as the first but still good.
one of the best games ever made
ну чё мне тут сказать, Портал 2 лучше чем Портал 1, вроде всё
первая половина игры не очень, вторая бомбезная, а конец печальный
wowwwwwwww ez game ez life gg

No suelen gustarme los juegos en primera persona. Es verdad que Portal 2 apenas tiene acción y no es agobiante, por eso me encanta. No me tiene constantemente en tensión como los shooters. El humor tan ácido y bien medido me fascina, por eso lo sigo jugando. Me han dicho que el 1 también es así, lo probaré.

Portal 2 - это классика, и можно купить как минимум для того, чтобы отдать дань классике.
Да и перепройти спустя столько лет - явно не будут лишним.
А также тут есть 3,14здатый редактор уровней, и просто намешав механизмы между собой, можно создать неплохой уровень, и почувствовать себя бигфакинбрейном.

В общем, не вижу ни одной причины чтобы не рекомендовать этот продукт к покупке.
Если вы собрались её покупать - покупайте. Стоит довольно дёшево, да и выглядит игра до сих пор хорошо.
this is a good game what else is there to say
Even 10 years later this game is pretty fun, even if I was a little stupid with the gel puzzles. Especially love the writing with Cave Johnson.
算是益智冒险解谜动作剧情游戏，虽然语音没有汉化的，但是不影响玩，章节长度也很适中 ，可以玩一会儿就停，而且有足够的满足感和成就感，反正玩就对了，我是先完了1，2比1内容多了非常多也充实了不同的场景。

Got this game on the ps3 way back with little big planet. Loved this game a lot and when I came back to play it felt amazing as ever. A classic game that worth a play now, and another 10 years in the future.
Easily the best 3d puzzle game ever. Just go and play it, for science.
THE COMPANION CUBE IS SENTIENT, I NEED HELP, ITS TRYING TO BREAK IN.

I would argue this is one of the best and most iconic puzzle games aside from the first portal, the co-op mode has consumed hours of my time and I have found myself playing workshop levels mindlessly for hours, I would wholeheartedly recommend this game if you haven't already purchased it.
Игра классная, проработанная, но  про неё почему-то все забыли!
It's a hard feat to top the first Portal, especially in terms of level design, but Valve did the impossible. And then they added co-op! Portal 2 is what game sequels should strive to be.
It is one of the best games ever. Great puzzles, funny and deep characters, and a great story line.

Its good. If it had a sequel I would buy it. IDK what it is though but it doesn't give off that same prime Valve feeling like L4D, TF2, and HL give off. Maybe its just me. I guess the game feels more like a puzzle game than a story game. Its good though!

The first game was great and this one is even better. Some of the puzzles weren't as straight forward as most of the first game's were and that is something I love way more about the second game. You actually have to sit and think about some of the puzzles instead of blazing through most of them like the first game. The levels were a good amount larger this time around and the game was really well paced. The community made chambers were also a game changer that gave me plenty more things to do after beating the campaign. overall, I really recommend this game to anyone.
休闲益智解谜类，第一遍玩很惊讶，不过没有什么特别地方值得我去玩第二遍，创意工坊是继续玩下去的动力源泉
amazing perfect for a 10 year old game too

Very good portal puzzle game. To me it aged well. May be played during a short break or just kill time. The dialogues in general are specially enjoyable (you'll understand if you play. Its a bit why i stuck to it)

O que dizer que não já foi dito? Uma obra maravilhosa que encapsula tudo que faz um jogo de Puzzle bom, ao mesmo tempo entregando uma história humorística, porém interessante e relativamente intrigante. Como se isto não fosse suficiente, o jogo também entrega um Multi Player que explora as qualidades citadas anteriormente, ao mesmo tempo oferecendo diversão para os dois jogadores. Esse é um jogo que vai muito além do que realmente precisava, mas isso o faz ser ainda mais valioso diante dos meus olhos.
9,5/10, vai jogar seu puto.
yeah its an ok game only played it for 1 or 2 hours though.

Truly amazing title.
Edit: Yup, still great.
Игра с очень интересным сюжетом. Кооперативные испытания очень интересны. Недорого и захватывающе. Хорошая графика. Очень хорошая игра. Спасибо.
really reallly good game, finished it within like 6 days, and it overall was pretty fun, i would recommend it to other people, and it is just overall fun, you should get it if ur reading htis
Game is great adventure and puzzle game that I recommend to everyone
masterfully made game, wish valve could count to 3 man :(
best fucking game ive every played in my ebntire life its so good i wanna cry and shi tmyselfd
It truely is a classic and deservedly so. The snide and sarcastic remarks from both Wheatley and Glados are what makes this one of the best that I have played
